trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for property tabs.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別的屬性索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyTab class provides the base class behavior for a property tab.
trans-unit.target: PropertyTab 類別提供基底類別行為的屬性索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: Property tabs are displayed on the toolbar of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control of the Properties window, and allow a component to display different views of its properties or other data.
trans-unit.target: 屬性索引標籤會顯示的工具列上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>控制項的 [屬性] 視窗，並允許元件，以顯示其屬性或其他資料的不同檢視。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: User code will usually not create an instance of a PropertyTab directly.
trans-unit.target: 使用者程式碼通常不會建立執行個體的 PropertyTab 直接。

trans-unit.source: Instead, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute> that indicates the type of the property tab or property tabs to display for a component can be associated with the properties or types that the PropertyTab should be displayed for.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute>指出屬性索引標籤或屬性的索引標籤，以顯示元件的類型可以是與屬性相關聯，還是應該 PropertyTab 型別顯示 for...in</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> will instantiate a PropertyTab of the type specified by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute> associated with the type or property field of the component that is being browsed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>會具現化所指定型別的 PropertyTab<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute>所瀏覽元件的類型或屬性欄位相關聯。</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyTabAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitmap that is displayed for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得所顯示的點陣圖<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> to display for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>顯示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> can display properties for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否此<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>可以顯示屬性指定的元件。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object can be extended; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件可以擴充。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array of components the property tab is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的元件屬性 索引標籤相關聯的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array of components the property tab is associated with.
trans-unit.target: [屬性] 索引標籤相關聯元件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Releases all the resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的所有資源釋都出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>所佔用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Allows a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 可讓<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>嘗試釋放資源並執行其他清除作業之前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab"></xref>回收進行回收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default property of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve the default property of.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的預設屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that represents the default property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>代表預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve the properties of.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the properties of the component.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含元件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the specified component that match the specified attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合指定的屬性所指定元件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve properties from.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that indicates the attributes of the properties to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref:System.Attribute>，表示要擷取之屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>其中包含的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the specified component that match the specified attributes and context.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合指定的屬性和內容之指定元件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context to retrieve properties from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，表示要擷取屬性的內容。

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve properties from.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that indicates the attributes of the properties to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref:System.Attribute>，表示要擷取之屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the properties matching the specified context and attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含符合指定的內容和屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help keyword that is to be associated with this tab.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個索引標籤相關聯的 Help 關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is set to the tab name.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這是設定為索引標籤名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword to be associated with this tab.
trans-unit.target: 要與此索引標籤相關聯的 Help 關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name for the property tab.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性的索引標籤的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name for the property tab.
trans-unit.target: [屬性] 索引標籤的名稱。
